title: 为何印度国际媒体火力全开，全部使用wuhan virus，过去一个月涨粉50万？
contents:
没办法，币太少了，只能发问题了，标题不应该是疑问句
印度国际媒体火力全开，全部使用wuhan virus，过去一个月涨粉50万

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tyUc927Sw60
Wuhan Coronavirus: Is China faking its economic recovery? | Gravitas
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TJ6avF-FQBU
Gravitas: How the world can make China pay? | Coronavirus Outbreak | COVID-19
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hxCbD0SVVIk
Gravitas: Wuhan Coronavirus: Six videos that triggered a panic

不得不说，印度媒体完全没有白左那种感觉，直接就说，一点顾虑都没有，而且零门槛融入英文世界，频道点赞情况很好，播放量很高，下面有零星粉蛆评论，但很快淹没在人海中...

难道说印度真的是细颈瓶克星？当时的细颈瓶面具实在是牛批

不得不说，这些英文媒体的影响力比中文自媒体大几十个数量级，China Uncensored，WION，Paul Joseph Watson

下面的评论也完全不像美国的媒体，而是完全一边倒向ccp virus，精选评论：
The Chinese have zero respect for any life form
They make Adolf Hitler look like a Sunday school teacher.
Indian and the US need to cut China off  from trade. Let's see how well China's ambitions go when they can't leech off of better nations.
I swear the chines are heartless.
They “won the battle” as in getting everyone sick battle
China fakes brands, rice, eggs and just about everything, they even send defective test kits. Why would anyone start believing them now?
Ccp are so disgusting, people in china are dying and they're acting like all is well but they are the ones who asked Taiwan for 200k body bags
The world MUST never trust greedy China anymore!! China is not a trust worthy country!!

请大家亲自订阅，亲自点赞
